description: This file contains API functions for retrieving author data, including listing authors with search and pagination, and fetching details of a single author. It exports functions that interface with a backend API via HTTP GET requests.

methods.name: listAuthors({ q = '', page = 1, pageSize = 12 } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of authors, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: getAuthor(id)
methods.description: Fetches detailed information of a single author by their ID.

ctags.name: listAuthors
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listAuthors({ q = '', page = 1, pageSize = 12 } = {}) {$/
